{{also|milch}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|milch}}, from {{inh|de|goh|miluh}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*meluks}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*h₂melǵ-}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/mɪlç/}} * {{a|Germany}} {{audio|de|De-Milch.ogg}} * {{a|Austria}} {{audio|de|De-at-Milch.ogg}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Milchen|pl2=Milche}} # [[milk]] {{gloss|white liquid produced by female mammals for their young to consume}} # [[milk]] {{gloss|white or whitish liquid that is exuded by certain plants}} # [[white]] [[liquid]] that is a [[mixture]] of other [[substances]], where one of the components is very finely distributed # white [[semen]] of a male [[fish]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|en}} {{de-decl-noun-f|e}} ====Related terms==== {{der3|de |Abendmilch |Avocadomilch
